DOC.brief_summary: Primary objective: â€¢ To demonstrate that administration of V503 induces non-inferior Geometric Mean Titers (GMTs) (for serum anti-HPV16 and anti-HPV18) compared to GARDASIL. Secondary objectives: - To evaluate the tolerability of V503 in 9-15 year-old girls. - To summarize humoral immune response (anti-HPV 6, 11, 16, 18) induced by V503 or GARDASIL.
DOC.brief_title: Immunogenicity and Tolerability of V503 Versus GARDASIL
DOC.criteria: Female from 9 to 15 years old. Good physical health. Known allergy to any vaccine component. History of severe allergic reaction. Thrombocytopenia or any coagulation disorder that would contraindicate intramuscular injections. Pregnant subject. Immunocompromised or immunodeficient subject. Splenectomy. Receipt of medication / vaccine that may interfere with study assessment. Fever History of a positive test for HPV, prior receipt of HPV vaccine or prior participation to HPV trial. Any condition that might interfere with study assessment.
